scripts.build-index: node_modules/markdown-to-slides/index.js src/index.md --style layout/slides/style.css --script layout/slides/script.js --template layout/slides/template.html -o dist/index.html
scripts.build-refactoring: node_modules/markdown-to-slides/index.js src/refactoring.md --style layout/slides/style.css --script layout/slides/script.js --template layout/slides/template.html -o dist/refactoring.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-design-pattern && npm run build-refactoring && npm run build-index && npm run build-annexe && cp -r lib/* dist/.
